attributes.action: Percentage refund of Council Tax for Local Service Strikes
attributes.additional_details:
Every household pays a Council Tax
This Tax is used to pay for local services i.e. Bin Men, Schools, Police and Fire Brigade but to name a few.
Recently there have been strikes by some of these services.
They do not receive pay when they strike and yet what happens to this money. We do not receive a refund in our Council Rates.
Its time that people should get what they pay for, not just pay for something that is demanded of us. Refunds should be issued if Service men and women do not work.
